thread.title: Wave of looting shutters stores, spreads fear in Venezuela

title: Wave of looting shutters stores, spreads fear in Venezuela
text:
Wave of looting shutters stores, spreads fear in Venezuela Wednesday, January 17, 2018 - 01:22 
A wave of looting by hungry mobs across Venezuela has left streets of shuttered shops in provincial towns and pushed some store owners to arm themselves with guns and machetes, stirring fear that the turmoil could spread to the capital Caracas.   
A wave of looting by hungry mobs across Venezuela has left streets of shuttered shops in provincial towns and pushed some store owners to arm themselves with guns and machetes, stirring fear that the turmoil could spread to the capital Caracas.  //reut.rs/2B9hq41
